file_content.text: I wonder if we could recruit the Order of Shasa.
After their research facility was sunk because of us? Definitely.
Okay, here's one: the Corellian Run Scoundrels.
No! Oh no, no. Please, let the galaxy fall.
Ah. Knew the party would die without us.
Are you kidding me?
Look at my serious face. You tell me if I'm lying.
Oh, man. Such a Lana thing to do.
I know! Isn't it?
What are you two discussing?
Nothing. Definitely not anything about any abductions on Rishi.
Lana, I have a confession to make. I tried the roast gorak.
What? When did you even have time?
I tried it, and--I didn't love it, but the sauce had this zing to it? I really--I really wish I had some.
Looks like things are winding down.
Len and Tora got into a drinking contest. It ended... poorly.
Hey, have you seen Senya? Has anyone seen Senya?
Koth, she's not hunting you anymore. You're going to have to trust her eventually.
She fought her own daughter.
She has a point.
I know. I hear you....
You can't make someone forget their past just like that. Give him time.
Let Koth work it out.
Fair enough....
I thought this was supposed to be a celebration.
This is a party.
Sorry for bringing it up.
Doesn't look like there's much celebrating, anyway.
Crew needs to be back to work in an hour. That should be fun.
I need to schedule some meetings.
Reminds me of my advisor days.
Thanks. All of you. It means a lot that you're here.
Good to be your ally, all.
Likewise... "Outlander".
I'll go see about Senya.
I'm going to find Senya.
I think she's outside.
Oh, so you did know where she was.
Think she went out for some air.
You knew where she went?
Tell her I said... sorry if I made her leave for some reason.
We have a lot to accomplish. Let's get to it.
Get working, everyone.
You heard her....
You heard him....
Tora! Len! Let's go, you miserable lightweights!
Ugh. Shut up!
If this is about the Gravestone, you've got nothing to worry about. She's coming together.
SCORPIO's clued me in to all kinds of needs and requirements. Think there's a lot she's holding back still, but I'm not about to press her.
A lot of resources needed to get everything in shipshape. We'll make it.
It's a relief to know you're on top of things.
Good job.
Something to be said for having a clear-cut purpose.
We have to make it. We'll need every asset we can muster to stop Arcann.
I hope so.
He's tougher than I gave him credit for. Could be more powerful than his father. In a way, though, it doesn't worry me.
Make your people understand they're on a tight schedule.
Work your crew harder.
I know how to get the best work out of my crew, and I intend to. What we've got going on here is huge.
When I first realized that was the Gravestone in the swamp, I knew, you know? There had to be a reason I found her.
I was meant to find that ship, and so were you. Two of us? Same course heading.
I'd like to think so.
[Flirt] I'm okay with that.
I know you can take care of yourself, but back on Asylum, I was sure we were going to lose you.
I'm right here, and I'm not going anywhere.
Any doubts I had, I take them back. Good to have you on board, Koth.
We'll work well together.
That makes us even.
I think we can agree not everyone in this camp shares our goals.
Help me watch for traitors.
Been through a lot of hell with lots of folks. I know what can happen when someone's in it for themselves. I'll keep an eye out.
We're going to do all right, Outlander--just as soon as I find something to snack on.
Any notion you have that we're equals, let it go. You're here to work for me.
Don't you dare compare us.
I'll keep it in mind, "chief".
Maybe we should get back. Wouldn't want anyone to think we're having fun without them.
It's quite something, isn't it? So much more than the last alliance we formed.
What I suspected when we aligned with Theron, Satele and Darth Marr has borne out.
I may have initiated events, but they would never have coalesced without you.
I should be dead inside a metal tomb right now. You were determined to break me out.
Don't sell yourself short.
No, that's not.... The truth was right in front of me but I didn't want to believe it.
We haven't succeeded yet. Far from it, in fact.
Can't get ahead of ourselves.
Agreed. But there's another truth I can no longer avoid.
This is how it was always going to be. How it was meant to be.
This is my destiny.
Normally, I'd take that sort of talk lightly. Maybe even joke.
I thought you were the only one to stop Arcann simply due to your capabilities, but now I see.
This is destiny. Your destiny. It goes against everything I know to be true, but it's there. It's real.
Maybe it's real, maybe it isn't. What matters are the choices we make.
[Flirt] It isn't important.
And who we make those choices with?
Nothing's more important.
Not if I do this alone, it's not. You're an important part of what we're trying to accomplish.
Only with your help.
Of course. And I'll continue to be for as long as you'll have me.
I think we should rejoin the party. We have earned it, after all.
We got here because we worked hard and made the right decisions. Add some luck, and that's all there is to it.
I don't buy it.
I would love to agree with you. You know that I would, but....
I'm in charge now. That's all that matters.
Just don't screw up.
I see. All right, understood.
Well. I don't suppose we should keep everyone waiting.
...with the way everything changed, the SIS didn't feel right for me anymore, so I walked away.
Kept up with my contacts, pretty much did what I was already doing, just not for the Republic. Not for anything. Against Zakuul.
Were you able to make any headway?
How did you fare?
I have found sympathetic Zakuulans, but not many.
A lot of folks moved out here from the Core Worlds. I'm having better luck recruiting them, but they're also under suspicion of being dissidents.
I hear Saresh installed a puppet Chancellor.
What's new with the Republic?
She's pulling the strings, no doubt about it. Made my decision to move along that much easier.
Saresh has her supporters--a lot of them--but she'll wind up grinding the Republic to dust, you watch.
What about your mother?
And Satele?
The Grandmaster? Well, the Jedi Order got scattered, plucked apart, and she decided to... go somewhere.
Didn't say where. No one's heard from her, far as I know.
And I guess Lana's filled you in on the rest. Want you to know, I'll do everything I can to keep things running smoothly around here.
So you'll take care of anyone who needs you?
[Flirt] Everything?
Not just anyone. I'm sorry I couldn't be there to thaw you out.
Look at all you've accomplished. Everyone who chose to rally behind you.
I haven't been one of those "destiny" people in a long time, but this? Sure feels like it.
If you mean being here with you, I agree.
I don't doubt it, Theron.
I know.
You got all these people to rally behind you. That was the hard part.
A lot of new faces around. Let's be cautious.
Watch the new ones.
I hear you, and I'm on top of it. We could have moles from Zakuul, Dromund Kaas, Coruscant, Czerka... you name it.
And I'm personally monitoring SCORPIO's communications. She terrifies me.
As well she ought to.
What do you say we get back out there? Maybe there's more food.
Anything goes wrong, the responsibility falls on you.
You had better.
Got it, boss.
Think it's time we headed back to the party.
To old friends and new allies.
Guess I can drink to that.
I'll drink to the second part.
Correction: I have never been to a place called Asylum, and have never met you before.
If you choose to continue the insinuation that I am anything other than--
Correction: I have never been to a place called Asylum, and have never met you before.
If you choose to continue the insinuation that I am anything other than--
Ugh. Okay, okay. Just don't call me a meatbag.
Query: What is a meatbag?
Query: What is a meatbag?
Perfect.
I do not enjoy this ceremony. New worlds are for hunting!
I do not enjoy this ceremony. New worlds are for hunting!
What's she saying?
Translation: The small mammal would rather hunt game than consume celebratory beverages.
Translation: The small mammal would rather hunt game than consume celebratory beverages.
I think she says she'd rather be hunting instead of drinking.
Yes. Yes! But I... am going to do both.
Do you even recall the last time we relaxed?
I can. It was two-point-six million years ago, and Senya was still a jerk.
And to think I was going to sing for you all tonight.
You were what? Oh, come on, I have got to hear this.
Too late now.
Theron. You can't let the weight of the galaxy rest on your shoulders all the time.
Isn't that why you talked me into coming here? To lighten your load?
I brought you here because you're good.
Hey, look who it is. Don't worry, we didn't really start without you.
Yes, we've only just begun. I wasn't sure you'd attend.
A chance to unwind after what we've been through is exactly what we need.
Wouldn't miss it.
You are exactly correct. Now get this guy to cheer up.
I'm reasonably cheery. I'm joining in. And now you are, too.
Do you think I'm that dull?
I'm not the party type?
Should I tell the truth?
Lie. Lie, lie, lie.
Ah, don't listen to them.
It's irresponsible. There's too much to be done.
We should be working.
Pfft! Live a little before we all die!
Maybe not a big surprise, but I'm with the commander on this one. Still... it can't be all work all the time.
So, are you going to have a drink with us or what?
I need to see one of you.
[Flirt] I need to see one of you.
I was hoping to have a talk with one of you first.
Oh? And who might that be?
Who could it be?
Yeah? Who'd you have in mind?
[Flirt] Koth.
[Flirt] Lana.
[Flirt] Theron.
Koth.
Not to tear you away from the party, Koth....
Already ate all the food. I'm good.
He really did eat all the food, didn't he?
Imagine if he was hiding out with us on Rishi.
Better than Jakarro.
Fair point, actually....
Lana.
Lana. Spare a moment?
Of course.
So.
I think I'll go--
Yeah. Yeah, of course. See you later.
Yep.
Theron.
Come on, Theron. Let's catch up.
You got it.
Is there any food? Or did you eat it all?
Hey. I mean I probably did, but come on.
Nice to see you two could bond over something.
Yeah? Well leave me out of it.
Koth?
Look--you can do impossible things and change the galaxy. Great. Doesn't mean I have to like everything you've ever done.
Take us in the right direction. I've got limits--and I'm not the only one.
I'll reason with him. After he's had time to calm down.
Hope he wasn't the one you wanted to talk to.
[Flirt] Actually, it was Lana.
[Flirt] It was you, Theron.
I was actually hoping to talk to Lana.
Actually, it was Lana.
No--it was actually you, Theron.
It was you, Theron.
Nevermind. Let's go back to the others.
Forget it.
Gladly.
Sure--let's catch up.
Of course.
It appears the celebration has died down.
Everyone's trudging back to work. Haven't found Senya yet, though.
Mind taking a look for her? Lana and I have some things to go over.
All right. I'll come find you afterward.
Works for me.
Party's over already?
Everyone's on their way back to work. Everyone but Senya--I haven't found her.
Could you find her? I need to discuss some logistical matters with Theron.
Very well. I'll meet with you shortly.
Thank you.
Looks like everyone got back to work.
Though now that I think back... Senya headed out before we did. Might be worth taking a look for her.
Agreed. In the meantime, Theron, we have some logistical matters to go over.
The fun never stops....
It was you, Theron.
Actually, it was Lana.
Hey, have you seen Senya? Has anyone seen Senya?
Hey, have you seen Senya? Has anyone seen Senya?
Koth, she's not hunting you anymore. You're going to have to trust her eventually.
Koth, she's not hunting you anymore. You're going to have to trust her eventually.
